name: NSTextLayoutFragment.EnumerationOptions
desc: Values that describe options for enumerating text layout fragments.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates an instance of the enumeration with the provided unsigned integer value.

items.name: static var ensuresExtraLineFragment: NSTextLayoutFragment.EnumerationOptions
items.desc: Synthesize the extra line fragment when necessary.

items.name: static var ensuresLayout: NSTextLayoutFragment.EnumerationOptions
items.desc: When enumerating, tell the layout fragments to layout their contents.

items.name: static var estimatesSize: NSTextLayoutFragment.EnumerationOptions
items.desc: When enumerating, tell the layout fragments to estimate their size.

items.name: static var reverse: NSTextLayoutFragment.EnumerationOptions
items.desc: Causes the enumeration to start from the last element.
